channel.title: Help With Adding Shop Items?
channel.description:
:confused:Im Kinda New To PS But I Know A Enough To Get Me By....I need help with changing items in my shops....i have a few sources, and i need a little help with adding more npc's with action "eg: shops, free stuff" like giving it to players of a certion lvl. any help will be great Thanks!!!! :confused:
~Shasta

item.title: Help With Adding Shop Items?

item.description:
@system wrote:

Im Kinda New To PS But I Know A Enough To Get Me By…I need help with changing items in my shops…i have a few sources, and i need a little help with adding more npc’s with action “eg: shops, free stuff” like giving it to players of a certion lvl. any help will be great Thanks!!!

~Shasta
